subject: Junit problem
msgSnippet: Is anyone using the JUnit framework with Visual J++? I am trying to use JUnit  3.8 with Visual J++  on Windows XP. I have recompiled the framework, set up the
messageBody:
Is anyone using the JUnit framework with Visual J++?


I am trying to use JUnit 3.8 with Visual J++ on Windows XP. I have
recompiled the framework, set up the classpaths correctly etc, and but I still
unable to run the testcases.

Could any body tell what is the procedure for it.
Any help or insights anyone could
provide would be greatly appreciated.

Regards,
Asutosh
